name: variableupdater
description: Task to update a variable in a variable group (library).
author: Seva Alekseyev
helpMarkDown: You need to assign the Administrator role to the 'Project Collection Build Service' in the variable group's Security window.

inputs.name: VariableGroupId
inputs.label: Variable group Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The numeric ID of the variable group to change. To find it out, browse to the group under Pipelines/Library and note the value of `variableGroupId` in the browser's query string.

inputs.name: VariableName
inputs.label: Variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable to add to the group or update. Case insensitive.

inputs.name: NewValue
inputs.label: New value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value to assign to the variable.
